body_content.explanation: a number that is part of a series in which each number is the sum (= total when added together) of the two numbers that come before it in the series, for example 0, 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8 ..:
examples: The fruit of a pineapple is arranged in two interlocking helices, eight in one direction, thirteen in the other, each being a Fibonacci number.
Changes in trends very often correspond with Fibonacci numbers.
